description: The Communications Electronic Warfare (CEW) group of the Navigation and Communications Electronic Warfare (NAVCOM EW) section at Defence Research & Development Canada – Ottawa Research Centre (DRDC ORC) has a requirement for two (2) Handheld RF Analyzers in support of the Centre’s Science and Technology (S&T) program. The portable analyzers will be used to perform measurement of RF signals in various configurations in laboratory and field environments.
